Override void run (  ) 

do the upload and then do a toast notification to the end user that you have uploaded something

int doUpload (  )  [private]

Do the bulk of the work for uploading data from the drdat_data db managed by DrdatGUI's DrdatFormCollector.

Uses the content provider DrdatDataProvider to get the data and flag records that have been uploaded.

Returns:
number of records uploaded
